        select json_build_object(
          'type', 'FeatureCollection',
          'features', json_agg(ST_AsGeoJSON(parcel.*)::json)
          )
        from parcel where gid in (229115, 132743, 32835, 199211, 255582, 51123, 225744, 16364, 106679, 210004, 139632, 197680, 135303, 136686, 132582, 148471, 154665, 72078, 196805, 196970, 197616, 197661, 197681, 199403, 199444, 199761, 235499, 236417, 242808, 199450, 211812, 218670, 226919, 69654, 90345, 196094, 106488, 193908, 194650, 202169, 95750, 103705, 70278, 162117, 119903, 100477, 104115, 103671, 132895, 139696, 193676, 193822, 196234, 197104, 197151, 197872, 198087, 198150, 198454, 199109, 199187, 199579, 199664, 199702, 219239, 228828, 252661, 95167, 75260, 77392, 135461, 136476, 126809, 130119, 147809, 33468, 149468, 223940, 152871, 104269, 105589, 194128, 108309, 44051, 44178, 755, 110371, 8736, 255906, 125027, 16125, 229457, 16311, 12240, 220379, 17829, 23269, 31483, 33174, 34624, 41122, 52447, 51819, 37505, 124979, 51088, 51619, 52604, 58446, 65480, 65934, 77620, 77938) or T_1_47_A is distinct from '082_2480' OR (T_1_47_A = ('081_2901') OR T_1_47_A =('081_2902'))
